pullrequest.title: Support for AlazarTech data acquisition cards (ATS9462 and potentially others)

content.raw:
A few more comments:

* Was the .ui file added accidentally? Looks to be left over from the previous server architecture. Delete it?
* Now that the numpy workaround is applied, uncomment `from __future__ import  unicode_literals` on line 6 (and test that this does not break anything).
* Since copyright has not been signed over to anyone and this is not a minor change, copyright is Lincoln Turner, not Monash (this same mistake has been made elsewhere in the suite and needs fixing).
content.html:
A few more comments:

  • Was the .ui file added accidentally? Looks to be left over from the previous server architecture. Delete it?
  • Now that the numpy workaround is applied, uncomment from __future__ import unicode_literals on line 6 (and test that this does not break anything).
  • Since copyright has not been signed over to anyone and this is not a minor change, copyright is Lincoln Turner, not Monash (this same mistake has been made elsewhere in the suite and needs fixing).
